rules: Rule1: Either the crew captures a lion or a backup generator is available.
Rule2: Provided that the lion is animal visible, if the camera battery is low then it is not the case that the crew captures a lion.
Rule3: Whenever the lion is in frame, it follows that the lion is animal visible.
Rule4: Under the condition that the crew is on location in the savanna, the lion is in frame.

Rule5: If the crew applies manual override to the camera, then if it is not the case that if the crew is not on location in the savanna then the weather is good in the savanna, it follows that it is not the case that the crew is at a safe distance from the lion.
Rule6: Either the crew applies manual override to the camera or the camera is in auto mode.

Rule7: If the camera is in auto mode, then given that it is not the case that if the crew is not on location in the savanna then the weather is good in the savanna, the crew is not at a safe distance from the lion.
Rule8: Either the director approves the shot or the producer approves the shot.

Rule9: In the event that the producer approves the shot, then if it is not the case that if the camera has power then it is not the case that the crew captures a lion, and this leads to using the backup camera, then it is not the case that the lion is animal disturbed.
Rule10: If the camera has power, then the camera battery is low.
Rule11: Under the condition that the production budget is exceeded, the crew is on overtime for the production.

Rule12: Either the production budget is exceeded or, if the director approves the shot, then if it is not the case that if the camera has power then it is not the case that the crew captures a lion, and this implies using the backup camera, then it is not the case that the lion is animal disturbed.
Rule13: If the crew is on overtime for the production, then the production schedule is delayed.
Rule14: Whenever the sound is mixed for the footage, narration is recorded for the footage.
Rule15: Under the condition that the footage undergoes final render, the sound is mixed for the footage.
Rule16: If the network is happy with the footage, then if it is not the case that if the footage is color corrected then the footage is edit ready, it follows that the footage undergoes final render.
Rule17: Provided that the footage receives critic praise, then if it is not the case that if the footage is color corrected then the footage is edit ready, the footage undergoes final render.
Rule18: Either the tripod is stable or the camera is mounted on a drone.
Rule19: Should the camera be mounted on a drone, then if it is not the case that if the camera has power then it is not the case that the crew captures a lion, the backup camera is used.
Rule20: If the platform is streaming a live feed, then the platform broadcasts a live feed.

Rule21: In the event that the platform broadcasts a live feed, then if it is not the case that if the tripod is stable then if it is not the case that if the camera has power then it is not the case that the crew captures a lion, the backup camera is used, the lion sequence footage is not usable.
Rule22: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the camera has power then it is not the case that the crew captures a lion, it is not the case that the backup camera is used.
Rule23: In the event that it is not the case that if the footage is color corrected then the footage is edit ready, it is not the case that narration is recorded for the footage.
Rule24: If it is not the case that either the network is happy with the footage or the footage receives critic praise, then the footage is award nominated.

Rule25: Should it be false that if the tripod is stable then if it is not the case that if the camera has power then it is not the case that the crew captures a lion, the backup camera is used, then the lion sequence footage is usable.

Rule26: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the camera has power then it is not the case that the crew captures a lion, then the backup camera is used, then the lion is animal disturbed.

Rule27: In the event that it is not the case that if it is not the case that either the network is happy with the footage or the footage receives critic praise, then it is not the case that the footage is award nominated, a sequel is greenlit for the footage.

Rule28: Under the condition that it is not the case that if it is not the case that either the network is happy with the footage or the footage receives critic praise, then it is not the case that the footage is award nominated, it is not the case that a sequel is greenlit for the footage.

Rule29: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the tripod is stable then if it is not the case that if the camera has power then it is not the case that the crew captures a lion, the backup camera is used, then it is not the case that the lion sequence footage is usable, the footage is color corrected.

Rule30: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the tripod is stable then if it is not the case that if the camera has power then it is not the case that the crew captures a lion, the backup camera is used, then it is not the case that the lion sequence footage is usable, then it is not the case that the footage is edit ready.
Rule31: In the event that it is not the case that if the crew is not on location in the savanna then the weather is good in the savanna, the crew is at a safe distance from the lion.
facts: Fact2: The platform is streaming a live feed.
Fact3: It is not the case that the weather is good in the savanna.
Fact4: It is not the case that the production schedule is delayed.
